Interface Messenger<Req extends AbstractRequest,Response extends AbstractResponse>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, BiConsumer<Response,Throwable>, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessenger, GameServerMessenger, MasterServerMessenger, SourceQueryMessenger, SourceRconMessenger, WebMessenger

    public interface Messenger<Req extends AbstractRequest,Response extends AbstractResponse>
extends BiConsumer<Response,Throwable>, Closeable
    Messenger is responsible for sending and receiving messages from clients.
